title: Reporting on Science (Part 1) – extended with Elise Andrew of IFLS and Bill Nye
description: Take a journey beyond the headlines into the business of science journalism with Miles O’Brien, Neil deGrasse Tyson and Chuck Nice, and a new interview with Elise Andrew of IFLS and Bill Nye.
author: feed@startalkradio.net (Neil deGrasse Tyson)
content:encoded: Take a journey beyond the headlines into the business of science journalism with Miles O’Brien, Neil deGrasse Tyson and Chuck Nice, and a new interview with Elise Andrew of IFLS and Bill Nye.
